Posts.Title: Conscious Sedation - anyone get sick? carlen carlen

Posts.Content: carlen wrote: I was talking to someone over the weekend who said that she was given something to calm her nerves (through her IV) while waiting for a biopsy under conscious sedation. She said she was nauseous and vomited after she went home. I've never heard of this happening! Has anyone else had this reaction? Maybe it was the combination of drugs...or nerves?? She said was extremely nervous. Thanks! Log in to post a reply
